description.narrative:
The number of leading civil society, governments, academia/knowledge institutes, companies, and financial institutions that have been engaged as part of the consultation and have granted their endorsement to the establishment of the WBA, as well as the number of people and organisations that have helped prioritise SDG-Industry intersections around which new benchmarks can be developed.
The 84 Allies (as of February 23rd, 2019) represent civil society organisations, multilaterals, academic institutions, financial institutions, sustainability benchmarks and reporting initiatives, and business platforms. Note that not all Allies’ logos are yet added to the WBA website.
Roundtables participants: More than 350.
See Outcome Indicator for endorsements.
